items.sentence: Tom was convinced that the way Mary was doing that was wrong.
Tom tried his best to look like he knew what he wanted to do.
Tom is hoping he that can go to Boston with Mary next summer.
It was dark and I couldn't make out the license plate number.
It looks like Tom has packed everything but the kitchen sink.
The flight attendant gave each passenger a drink and a snack.
Tom had a mug of coffee in one hand and a donut in the other.
Tom knocked over Mary's drink as he was reaching for his own.
Tom and Mary clinked their glasses together and took a drink.
Tom has put on a lot of weight since the last time I saw him.
